# César Award for Best Short Film__disambig_1

}}
The César Award for Best Short Film () is a discontinued award presented by the Académie des Arts et Techniques du Cinéma from 1992 to 2021. It was split into the César Award for Best Fiction Short Film and César Award for Best Documentary Short Film in 2022.
